Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Andante in C major, D 29

1812

[IMSLP]

Schubert used versions of this piece in an incomplete movement for string quartet (D 3) and a sketch for the slow movement of the string quartet in B-flat major (D 36).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/4 · BA 5525 · Klavierstücke I · ed. David Goldberger
  • Associated Board · Nine Short Piano Pieces · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Henle · HN 444 · Klavierstücke / Klaviervariationen · ed. Gertraut Haberkamp

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2
